summary: Adds a the Unique Sword "Passion Never Dies" to your Game.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]icqfV5mP2Fw[/youtube] [youtube]WVeOHfEJZFc[/youtube] [youtube]jqkckHJFlKw[/youtube] [youtube]BTQkzx7y0EU[/youtube]

[center][size=4]Name of the Author of the real Sword: Brendan Olszowy.
His website is www.fableblades.com.
The link to this piece is here: http://www.fableblades.com/Passion.html[/size][/center]

[center][/center]


[img]http://picload.org/image/lplrwcw/123.png[/img]



[center][img]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/img][/center]

[font=Garamond][size=5][color=#938953]Description:[/color][/size][/font]

So here i wanna share my latest creation with you guys, big news this one actually got created using only hard cold references xD

Till now i almost always made stuff from my imagination(which is easier.. try it yourself..) considering this you shouldnt expect a 100% matching every detail epic copy of the sword my modeling skills are limited texturing oneÂ´s even more but i did my best and im very happy with the result. :)

Its Craftable in the Steel Section at the Forge.

[font=Garamond][size=5][color=#938953]Install:[/color][/size][/font]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Passion Never Dies.esp

[font=Garamond][size=5][color=#938953]Uninstall:[/color][/size][/font]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[center][img]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/img][/center]


Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
